EmailTemplate.description: DPT-Introduction of New DuPont™ Kevlar® Pulp Distributor- Asbury Graphite Mills, Inc.
EmailTemplate.name: DPT- Introduction of New DuPont™ Kevlar® Pulp Distributor
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Kevlar® Announcement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} DuPont™ is proud to celebrate the 50th anniversary this year of Kevlar®.
In addition to celebrating this milestone, we are pleased to announce that Asbury Graphite Mills, Inc. is now a distributor for DuPont™ Kevlar® Pulp, floc and staple. Asbury has a strong presence in friction, plastic and rubber markets. They have the ability to serve a diverse base of customers complemented by excellent technical support . In an effort to serve you better and meet your growth needs, Asbury will be your supplier for DuPont™ Kevlar® Pulp, floc and staple, effective April 1st 2015. Jeff Julian, Asbury Product Manager will be your main contact at Asbury. His contact information is below:
Jeff Julian Industrial Marketing Director Asbury Graphite Mills, Inc. PO Box 144, 405 Old Main Street Asbury, NJ 08802 908-537-2155 X2230 jjulian@asbury.com
Please provide us with the right contact in your organization that we can share with Asbury to have them contact you. (send to : France.rochette@dupont.com) By providing us with the right contact in your organization, you granting DuPont permission to share your Contact information, email and phone number with Asbury so they can contact you. We will also contact you shortly to discuss the specific details of the requirements and transition.
We want thank you for choosing DuPont™ Kevlar® Pulp for your business over the years, and for entrusting your aramid pulp needs to DuPont.
France Rochette • DuPont™ Protection Technologies North American Account Manager Automotive & Mechanical Rubber Goods • Kevlar® & Nomex® 289-259-4210 France.rochette@dupont.com
Beth L Taylor DuPont™ Protection Technologies Account Manager DuPont™ Nomex®/ DuPont™ Kevlar® 5401 Jefferson Davis Highway • Richmond VA 23234
Phone: (877) 713 -1299 or 804-383-2194 beth.l.taylor@usa.dupont.com This communication is for use by the intended recipient and contains information that may be Privileged, confidential or copyrighted under applicable law. If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby formally notified that any use, copying or distribution of this e-mail, in whole or in part, is strictly prohibited. Please notify the sender by return e-mail and delete this e-mail from your system. Unless explicitly and conspicuously designated as "E-Contract Intended", this e-mail does not constitute a contract offer, a contract amendment, or an acceptance of a contract offer. This e-mail does not constitute a consent to the use of sender's contact information for direct marketing purposes or for transfers of data to third parties.
The dupont.com http://dupont.com web address may be used for a limited period of time by the following divested businesses that are no longer affiliated in any way with DuPont: Borealis Polymers NV Jacob Holm & Sonner Holding A/S (Jacob Holm) Kuraray Co., Ltd
DuPont accepts no liability or responsibility for the content or use of communications sent or received on behalf of such divested businesses or for the consequences of any actions taken on the basis of such communications.
